name: BlackDuckHubScan
description: Execute a Black Duck Hub scan against your build
author: Black Duck Software, Inc.
instanceNameFormat: Execute a Black Duck Hub scan against your build $(message)

inputs.name: HubUsername
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username to access your Black Duck Hub instance.

inputs.name: HubPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password to access your Black Duck Hub instance.

inputs.name: HubUrl
inputs.label: Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the URL for your Black Duck Hub Server - please include the port if other than 80 (http) or 443 (https)

inputs.name: HubFailOnPolicyViolation
inputs.label: Fail the Build for Hub Policy Violations

inputs.name: HubScanTimeout
inputs.label: Scan Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: In minutes (set to zero for no timeout.)
